Name: Jolt Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Elekid, Electabuzz, and Electivire.  Swap an Elekid Claw and an Elekid Card for a Jolt Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
